sentences.en: " A new phase in the history of Russia begins "
sentences.cn: “ 俄国历史的新阶段开始了 ”

sentences.en: a new drug that is in the experimental phase
sentences.cn: 处于试验阶段的一种新药

sentences.en: At Flat the host is quartz diorite with a finegrained contact phase.
sentences.cn: 在富来梯,主岩为细粒接触相的石英闪长岩.

sentences.en: It’s just a phase he’s going through .
sentences.cn: 这只是他要经历的一个阶段。

sentences.en: It’s just a phase he’s going through.
sentences.cn: 这只是他要经历的一个阶段。

sentences.en: Luckily her disease was discovered in an early phase.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是,她的病在早期就被发现了.

sentences.en: Most kids will go through a phase of being faddy about what they eat.
sentences.cn: 大多数孩子都会经历挑食的阶段。

sentences.en: Parts II and III provide useful principles for the Refinement phase.
sentences.cn: 另外,程序员在细化阶段也应该密切参与,这是很关键的.

sentences.en: Post-feminism does not actually exist because we are still in the phase of pre-feminism.
sentences.cn: 后女权主义实际上并不存在，因为我们仍处在前女权主义阶段。

sentences.en: Should you pick only one friend from each phase of your life, or more than one?
sentences.cn: 应该从你生活的每个阶段选择一位朋友，还是不止一个朋友？

sentences.en: Such a dikaryon cannot apparently exist independently of the haploid phase.
sentences.cn: 这样的双核体显然不能独立于单倍体阶段而存在.

sentences.en: the cabling work should be carried out &B{in phase with} the building work.
sentences.cn: 电缆工程应当与建筑工程同步进行。

sentences.en: The camshaft rotates in phase with the crankshaft, but at half its speed.
sentences.cn: 凸轮轴和曲轴协调旋转, 但速度仅是曲轴的一半.

sentences.en: The carrier wave has got out of phase with the signal wave.
sentences.cn: 载波同信号波是异相的.

sentences.en: The crisis is entering a crucial, critical phase.
sentences.cn: 目前危机正进入决定性的关键阶段。

sentences.en: The disease was discovered in an early phase.
sentences.cn: 病在早期已被发现.

sentences.en: The phase of writing that is actually most important is revision.
sentences.cn: 实际上写作过程中最重要的阶段是修改。

sentences.en: The Skills Programme is out of phase with the rest of the curriculum.
sentences.cn: 技能课程与其他课程不协调。

sentences.en: This phase of chemistry lasted till about 1700.
sentences.cn: 化学的这个阶段差不多一直延续到1700年.

sentences.en: We should phase the input and output of the machine.
sentences.cn: 我们应该使机器的输入功率和输出功率的相位同步。

sentences.en: You might think from the foregoing that the French want to phase accents out. Not at all.
sentences.cn: 根据前文所述，你们可能以为法国人打算废除各种口音。事实并非如此。

phrases.tran_cn: （不）同相的（地）；（不）同步的（地）；（不）协调的（地）
按阶段：用相关的或同步的方式
不分阶段：用不同步的或不相关的方式
[物理]（表示物质的各种相态平衡关系的）相图
分阶段引介：一阶段一个地引入
逐步撤除：一次一个阶段地结束
两相的；二相；二相的；双相的

trans.tran_cn: 阶段，时期，月相，（月亮的）盈亏
trans.tran_en: one of the stages of a process of development or change

trans.tran_cn: 分阶段实行，逐步做，使定相
分阶段实行， 逐步做
trans.tran_en: to make something happen gradually in a planned way
